sd_navi_comment.description: We've prepared a variety of minigames for you to play!\nWhich will you try first?
Allow me to introduce some entertaining minigames!\nWhich game catches your interest the most?
This game is available for the low, low price of {0} rupies!\nI do hope you'll enjoy it!
Tap the screen in time with the moving heart! Are you ready to help Shizuru and Eriko prepare some chocolate treats?
Pull Kuka back, then let go and watch her fly! Thanks to all sorts of unexpected disasters, she might have quite the journey!
Tap the left and right of the screen to defeat the incoming Majimun! Show them the power of your Ryukyu-Ken Spiral Shot!
In this minigame, your task is to link panels using their first and last letters. Just remember, your answer mustn't end in X!
